metadata.title: CVE-2021-20255 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A stack overflow via an infinite recursion vulnerability was found in theeepro100 i8255x device emulator of QEMU. This issue occurs while processingcontroller commands due to a DMA reentry issue. This flaw allows a guestuser or process to consume CPU cycles or crash the QEMU process on thehost, resulting in a denial of service. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: qemu package in noble is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
